function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Rapid spread of COVID-19","Impact":"High rates of infection and potential overload of healthcare systems","Mitigation":"Implement strict preventive measures and increase healthcare capacity","Technologies":"Contact tracing apps, remote healthcare, and telemedicine","People":"General public, healthcare workers, and vulnerable populations","Owner":"Government, healthcare organizations, and public health agencies"},{"Description":"Long incubation period of COVID-19","Impact":"Difficulty in identifying and isolating infected individuals","Mitigation":"Increase testing capacity and quarantine protocols","Technologies":"Rapid testing kits, monitoring systems, and quarantine tracking apps","People":"General public, healthcare workers, and public health agencies","Owner":"Government and healthcare organizations"},{"Description":"Decline in public transportation use","Impact":"Loss of revenue for transportation companies and employment challenges for workers","Mitigation":"Implement safety measures and economic support for affected workers","Technologies":"Hygiene protocols, contactless payment, and virtual ticketing systems","People":"Transportation workers, commuters, and public transportation operators","Owner":"Transportation companies and government"}]}
